CustomField.description: Stores a string showing the contract term in years and months
CustomField.formula: IF(Contract_End_Date__c - Contract_Start_Date__c >= 364, IF(ISBLANK(Contract_Term_Years__c), NULL,TEXT(Contract_Term_Years__c) & " Year" & IF( OR(Contract_End_Date__c - Contract_Start_Date__c >= 729, Contract_End_Date__c - Contract_Start_Date__c < 364 ), "s", NULL)) , NULL) & IF( OR( Contract_Term_Months__c != 0, Contract_End_Date__c - Contract_Start_Date__c < 30 ), " " & TEXT(Contract_Term_Months__c) & " Months", NULL)
CustomField.label: Contract Term
